AbilityDef.label: royal address
AbilityDef.description: is giving a royal address from the throne.If all goes well, every titled participant will gain a small amount of honor, and they will gain honor for each titled participant. If it goes poorly, the speech will do social damage and will lose honor for each titled participant. The outcome depends on their social abilities. Imperial nobility currently residing in the area will join the speech and count as titled participants.
